alert.note: Alert for Central Sacramento Valley; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:16PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Glenn County through 700 PM PDT... At 616 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alder Springs, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alder Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Sacramento Valley; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County
